relation: Eight of our best friends are celebrating OM Personal Eighth Anniversary. OM PEOPLE allows you to practise creative listening comprehension with fun. Placing your mouse on our friends' faces you will read what they are talking about, and by clicking on their faces you will access assignments with online answers. These comments provide with wide possibilities for ESL Intermediate to Advanced students and teachers, so come to our dinner table... and enjoy your meal !!
50 bilingual Frank Sinatra lyrics with MP3 audios, videos, full grammar and glossaries. Enjoy them!! OM Personal is just the ONLY web on the Internet with this material.

Laughter has demonstrated to be fully therapeutic as it helps release endorphins and reduce your stress. Here you will find hilarious sound files with full transcriptions and bilingual glossaries. This new section also provides wide possibilities for ESL students and teachers. Come in, listen and show your big smile !!!
Argentine artists and specialists speak about their careers and show their CVs (in Spanish).
pageTitle: OM Personal Ingles-Cursos de Ingles Gratis Online-Ingles Free Gratuito Multimedia en Internet
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {238=This is your personal library in our portal: 50 works from well-known English and American writers. Each author has an infopage with her/his biography and complete information about each volume. Books have been zipped so you can download them onto your computer easily. At present you can download books from these authors: Louisa May Alcott, Jane Austen, John Buchan, Gilbert K. Chesterton, Agatha Christie, Charles Dickens, Edward M. Forster, Elizabeth Gaskell, Francis Bret Harte, Nathaniel Hawthorne, Henry James, Katherine Mansfield, George Orwell, Edgar Allan Poe, William S. Porter (O. Henry), George Bernard Shaw, Mary Shelley, Robert L. Stevenson, Bram Stoker, William Thackeray, Mark Twain, Herbert George Wells, Edith Wharton and Oscar Wilde.  }
